sentences.english: Of misfortunes never come singly is, united States China also is produced because of embarrassing, die in the hospital.
sentences.chinese: 祸不单行的是，美华也因为难产，死在医院里。

sentences.english: Economic disaster has coincided with political chaos.
sentences.chinese: 祸不单行，经济灾难与政治混乱结伴同行。

sentences.english: A：Yesterday wad a real double whammy.
Mary lost her car yesterday and her job today. It was a real double whammy.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽昨天丢车，今天丢工作，真是祸不单行。

sentences.english: It never rains but it pours, kitano hid the siege suddenly like a storm raids.
sentences.chinese: 祸不单行，北野武藏的围攻忽然如狂风骤雨般袭来。

sentences.english: But that was only the beginning of the company's troubles.
sentences.chinese: 但是，祸不单行，这家公司还将面对更多的麻烦。

sentences.english: Like what they say, it never rains but it pours .
sentences.chinese: 这真像人们说的，祸不单行。

sentences.english: Misfortunes never come singly to men, and they did not to the gods.
sentences.chinese: 祸不单行的是男性，他们没有皈依于神。

definition: when it rains, it pours (idiom)
pinyin: wu1 lou4 pian1 feng2 lian2 ye4 yu3

definition: sudden and unexpected disaster (idiom)
fortune as unpredictable as the weather, every day may bring fortune or calamity (idiom); sth unexpected may happen at any moment
pinyin: tian1 you3 bu4 ce4 feng1 yun2 , ren2 you3 dan4 xi1 huo4 fu2
related.word: 天有不测风云，人有旦夕祸福

definition: blessings never come in pairs (idiom)
to add hail to snow (idiom); one disaster on top of another/to make things worse in a bad situation
unexpected calamity
the year's horoscope augurs ill (idiom); an unlucky year
curious coincidence
before the first wave subsides, a new wave rises (idiom); a new problem arises before the old is solved/many twists and turns to a story/one thing after another
pinyin: yi1 bo1 wei4 ping2 , yi1 bo1 you4 qi3

definition: the old man lost his mare, but it all turned out for the best (idiom); fig. a blessing in disguise/it's an ill wind that blows nobody any good
pinyin: sai4 weng1 shi1 ma3 yan1 zhi1 fei1 fu2

definition: misfortune/adversity/unfortunate/sad/unfortunately/CL:個|个[ge4]
extreme joy turns to sorrow (idiom); Don't celebrate too soon, things could still go wrong!
God's plans supersede our own/Man proposes but God disposes
pinyin: ren2 suan4 bu4 ru2 tian1 suan4

definition: variant of 厄運|厄运[e4 yun4]
news of sb's death/grievous news
